rev.comment: updated info about website being offline (it is now online)
rev.diff:
Line 31: Line 31:
Recently{{When|date=March 2010}} several ISPs have started blocking Openbittorrent and Publicbt.{{Citation needed|date=March 2010}}
Recently{{When|date=March 2010}} several ISPs have started blocking Openbittorrent and Publicbt.{{Citation needed|date=March 2010}}
â
Recently the ISP hosting openbittorrent has been ordered to hand over the identity of openbittorrent operators to hollywood movie companies or face a hefty fine of SEK 500,000 ($63,633)<ref>[http://torrentfreak.com/isp-must-hand-over-identity-of-openbittorrent-operator-100519/ ISP Must Hand Over Identity Of OpenBitTorrent Operator]</ref>, the site as well as the tracker has been taken offline since then.
+
Recently the ISP hosting openbittorrent has been ordered to hand over the identity of openbittorrent operators to hollywood movie companies or face a hefty fine of SEK 500,000 ($63,633)<ref>[http://torrentfreak.com/isp-must-hand-over-identity-of-openbittorrent-operator-100519/ ISP Must Hand Over Identity Of OpenBitTorrent Operator]</ref>, the site as well as the tracker were offline for a few weeks but are now online as of 1st June, 2010.
